item.title: Perl_mv_rename_file
item.description: #!/usr/bin/perl use warnings; use strict ; use File::Copy; .... move("rename_".$ARGV[0], $ARGV[0]); move($original_file, $new_file) or die "The move operation failed: $!"; copy($original_file, $new_file); copy($original_file, $new_file) or die "The copy operation failed: $!";
